biocontainers.name: sparc
biocontainers.summary: A sparsity-based consensus algorithm for long erroneous sequencing reads.

biotools.summary: Apache Spark based Read Clustering tool to cluster a large number of DNA/RNA sequences generated from next-generation sequence technologies, including Illumina and PacBio.

bioschemas.name: SpaRC
bioschemas.summary: Apache Spark based Read Clustering tool to cluster a large number of DNA/RNA sequences generated from next-generation sequence technologies, including Illumina and PacBio.
